198448.<cs_pchero>は ルッチーと合流し\nシェルブリッジで 夜を待った……。:
<cs_pchero> met up with Lucchie
and waited for night to come at
the Shell Bridge...

198449.「うっし 夜も来たし\n さっそく やっちゃいますかぁ～！\n <cs_pche:
Well, the night is here, so let's get to it!
Take my picture, <cs_pchero>!

198450.「夜空に ブチアゲてやんぜ！！\n 遊び人のォ～ ファイア・ワークス！！:
I'm gonna shoot it into the night sky!
Gadabout Fireworks!

198454.「うおーい！ 見てたか デスワーク！！\n 遊びクラブは てめぇなんかに 負けね:
Whoa! You see that, Deathwerk? I'm not gonna
let you beat me in the play club!

198456.「なんだ パイセンか！\n いったい どこ行ってたんだぁ～？: What, Paisen! Where the hell have you been?

198458.「オイオイ マジかよ……。\n 遊び人を襲ってた デスワークの正体は……:
Oy, seriously... the death work that was
attacking the gadabout was...

198459.「……たしかに ワタクシは\n 労魔デスワークと 呼ばれているようデスが\n そ:
It is true that I am called Labor Demon
Deathwork, but there is a misunderstanding
there, Mr. Lucchie.

198460.「ワタクシの行為は 皆サマが ココロにひめた\n 願いをかなえるという 奉仕活動:
My act is a service to fulfill the wishes that
everyone has in their hearts. I am doing this
treatment to wish for your happiness.

198461.「幸福って……なんのことだよ？\n デスワークは遊び人を襲って 無理矢理働かせる:
Happiness... what are you talking about? I
thought death work was a demon of labor that
attacked gadabouts and forced them to work!

198462.「ひとつ……古い話を お聞かせしまショウ。: Let me tell you an old story.

198463.「形あるモノは すべて 滅びゆくサダメ……\n やがて故障し 歴史の闇に埋もれて:
Everything that has a form is
dying...eventually it will break down and be
buried in the darkness of history.

198464.「時を経て 地中から発掘された ロボは\n ひとりの遊び人に拾われ 修理されたの:
After a long time, the robot was unearthed from the ground, found by a gadabout, and repaired. A photo uploading function was
added...

198465.「そして 遊び人タチの写真を 取り込んでは\n 写真に宿る 陽の感情をも読み込ん:
And when he took pictures of the gadabouts, he also read the yang emotion that resided in the pictures, thus forming the ostensibly cheerful
character.

198466.「デスが…… 奉仕ロボは 写真に宿った\n 遊び人タチの心に潜む 負の感情さえも:
But the service robot can read the negative
emotions that lurk in the hearts of the
gadabout in the photo. That's exactly...

198467.「遊び人として生きるコトへの ためらい。\n 社会への後ろめたさ。未来への不安…:
Hesitation to live as a gadabout. Guilt toward
society. The gadabout's hesitation gave birth
to Death Work!

198468.「デスワークは パイセンの中の\n 二重人格みてぇなモンってことか……。\n だ:
Death work is like a double personality inside
Plug, but....

198469.「……遊び人が デスワークの存在を\n 願ってるはずねーだろ！ オレらは\n 遊:
How could a gadabout wish death work into
existence? We're proud to be gadabouts!

198470.「イイエ。アナタがた 遊び人の皆サマは\n ワタクシの施術を 求めていらっしゃる:
Yes. You gadabouts are all asking for my
treatment! I'll find out right away!

198471.「グッ！？ な…なんだ これ……！？\n ムネに重苦しいモヤモヤが わきあがって:
Ggh! What is this? A heavy, heavy feeling is
rising in my chest!

198472.「キョキョキョ！ やはり ワタクシの\n マインドセラピーは 効果絶大のようデス:
Kyoukyoukyou! As I thought, my mind therapy
seems to be very effective!

198473.「遊び人の皆サマの 真の願いをかなえる方法は\n たったひとつだけ…… 遊び人を:
There is only one way to fulfill the true
wishes of all gadabouts and that is to stop
being gadabouts and go to work!

198474.「アナタ……ワタクシの マインドセラピーが\n 全く効いてないのデスか！？ まる:
Are you sure my mind therapy isn't working at
all? It's as if being a gadabout is a no-
brainer...

198475.「……そんなコトは ありえまセン！ バグだ！\n バグは 排除しなければなりまセ:
Plug, that's not possible! It's a bug! Bugs
have to be eliminated! Come on, work, work!

198476.「ギギ…バ…バカな……ッ！\n 遊び人でいるコトに……迷いが…ないとは……:
Gigi... ba... ba... baka... baka... baka! I
didn't think you had any doubts... about being
a gadabout...

198480.「おおッ パイセン！！\n デスワークは 消えちまったんだな！？\n なあ 大丈:
Oh, Plug! Death work has disappeared, hasn't
it! Hey, are you okay, Plug!

198481.「ス…スマネェ……\n おどるチカラが もう残ってねえみてェだ……。:
S...smaneh...it looks like you don't have any
energy left to dance...

198482.「オレと…遊んでくれて……\n アリガトよォ……。\n た…のしかっ…た……ぜィ:
Thanks for... playing... with... me... and...
having... fun... with... me...

198486.「んあ！？\n な～んか 見たことあるわ～思うてたら\n コイツ なつかしの鉄ク:
What? I was thinking, "I've seen this guy
before..." But it turns out he's the iron
scrapper from my youth!

198487.「……なんだよ 父ちゃん。\n パイセンのこと 知ってんのか？: ...What the hell, Dad? You know Plug?

198488.「ハァ～ アホちゃうかァ？ 知ってるも何も\n コイツは 昔 ワイが修理したんや:
Are you stupid? I know you know, but I fixed
this guy a long time ago!

198489.「せやけど…… もう あかんわ。\n 直りそうもあらへんな……。\n 無事なのは:
But... it's no good now. The only thing that's
safe is the uploader.

198491.「もともと 古代の機械のようだし……\n もう 寿命なのかもしれないわねぇ。:
It seems like an ancient machine to begin
with... maybe it has reached the end of its
life span.

198492.「アップローダーが生きてるなら……。: If the uploader is still alive...

198493.「<cs_pchero>っち…… パイセンへの\n せめてもの とむらいとして:
<cs_pchero>... as a small token of
appreciation to Plug, could you please take a
picture of the fireworks you just saw?

198494.<cs_pchero>は 花火の写真を\nパイセンに 読み込ませた！:
<cs_pchero> loaded the pyrotechnics pics
into his Plug!

198495.「パイセン…… 今まで ありがとな。\n もっと 一緒に 遊びたかったぜ……。:
Plug... thanks for everything. I wish we could
have had more fun together...

198496.「……ホア！？\n い…いま ピカって 光らんかった？: What? Didn't you just get a flash?

198498.「ドハデな花火が アガってたんで！！\n お祭り好きの血が さわいじゃって……\:
The fireworks were so loud and exciting! My
festival-loving blood got excited... and the
next thing I know, I'm here!

198499.「あと……写真も 見ましたァ！！\n マジ やばかったっす！ サイコーでしたァ！:
And...I saw the pictures! It was really
awesome! It was great! I really want to play
with Mr. Lucchie!

198500.「写真 あたしも見たけど\n ちょーいいね！ ……なカンジだった！:
I saw the pictures too and they are great! It
was like....

198501.「あそクラ やめるなんて言って ごめん……。\n もし よかったら また遊んでほ:
I'm sorry I said I was quitting Asokura... but
if you want, I'd love it if you'd play with me
again! Because it's more fun with you guys!

198503.「オイ ジブンら！！\n パ…パイセンが……！！: Hey, Jibun and the others! The... plug...!

198505.「さっきの写真に いいね！ が\n いっぱい 集まってきてるんだ～！: I like your picture! on the photo I just took!

198509.「いいね！ に込められた 人々の楽しい感情が\n パイセンの回路に チカラをあた:
Like it! may have given power to Plug's
circuits and worked miracles.

198510.「……イマドキの遊び人とやらも\n 捨てたモンじゃないわね。彼らなら\n 遊びで:
...Trendy Gadabouts are not to be
underestimated. They could make the whole
world happy.

198511.「せやな…… 考えを改めなあかん。\n アイツらの前には 無限の可能性が広がって:
You're right... I have to change my mind. They have unlimited possibilities spread out before them. They are the ones who will make the
future of gadabouts.

198513.夜遅くまで パーティーは もよおされ\nある者は歌い ある者は踊って\n遊びクラ:
The party went on until late into the night,
with some singing, some dancing, and others
reveling in the joy of the club's revival.

198514.そして 夜が明けた……！\n遊びハウスに 戻ろう。<me 64>:
And the dawn breaks...! Let's go back to
Gadabode.<me 64>

203992.「その昔 人々の心に潜む 願望を読み取り\n かなえてくれる 奉仕ロボがいたのデ:
Once upon a time, there was a service robot that could read people's innermost desires and fulfill them. He was useful and appreciated by
everyone.
